title: Roasted Poblano Vinaigrette
ingredients: - 2 poblano chiles, roasted, peeled, seeded and chopped
- Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
directions: Combine the poblanos, 2 tablespoons cold water, the vinegar, garlic, honey, canola oil, and salt and pepper in a blender or food processor and puree until smooth. This can be made up to 8 hours in advance and refrigerated.
